snippet: Delta Air Lines said bad weather caused it to scrub nearly 8,000 flights in February, but the cancellations helped lift a crucial measure of revenue per mile.
abstract: Delta Air Lines announces that bad weather caused it to scrub nearly 8,000 flights in February, but the cancellations helped lift a crucial measure of revenue per mile; shares soar 5.7 percent to nominal high since company exited bankruptcy protection in 2007.
lead_paragraph: Delta Air Lines said bad weather caused it to scrub nearly 8,000 flights in February, but the cancellations helped lift a crucial measure of revenue per mile.

headline.main: Delta Improves a Crucial Figure of Revenue for Each Mile
headline.print_headline: Delta Improves a Crucial Figure of Revenue for Each Mile
